checklist:
- runFlow:
    when:
        visible: OK
    commands:
        - evalScript: ${console.log('NAO CONSEGUIU ENTRAR')}

- runFlow:
    when:
        visible: Engate
    commands:
        - runScript:
            file: tratamentoErros.js
            env:
                myParameter: 'entrada placa valida'
Home:
- runFlow:
    when:
        visible: Ver viagem
    commands:
        - tapOn: 'Ver viagem'

- runFlow:
    when:
        visible: Abrir Chat
    commands:
        - tapOn: 'Abrir Chat'
